{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = Wle600v5-23.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Wireless miniPCIe adapter |caption2 = 802.11ac 5GHz 2T2R 867Mbps |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = Compex_WLE600V5-23 |wikipedia = |brand = Compex |model = WLE600V5 |submodelappend = |submodel = -23 |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 11/04/2014 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Compex_WLE600V5-23 |sernum = |wlclass = AC867 |series = |if = Mini PCIe |if_bus_version = 1.1 |ifconnector = |formfactor = |vendor_id = |device_id = |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = |icid = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = |chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9882;QCA9882 v2; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = MMCX |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |802.11ac = 867 |nqam = |802.11n = 300 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = Compex |manuf_model = WLE600V5-23 8AB000 |manuf_rev = v1.0 |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = an+ac |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = Replaced |fccapprovdate = |eoldate = |estreldate = 10/30/2014 |price = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== '''Product is no longer available, please refer to [[Compex WLE600V5-27]]''' {{CompexMailKimp}} ===Features=== * Qualcomm-Atheros QCA9882 (Peregrine Series) * Maximum 23dBm output power (per chain), 26dBm (aggregate) * IEEE 802.11ac compliant & backward compatible with 802.11a/n * 2X2 MIMO Technology & up to 867Mbps * MiniPCI Express 1.1 interface *This Compex 802.11ac 5Ghz Wireless Module has a maximum output power of 23dBm per chain, :part of Compex acWave series of 11ac Products, featuring QCA9882 V2 Chipset with overall :throughput up to 867Mbps with 2 x 2 supporting MIMO. Sporting 2 x MMCX Antenna Connectors :with built in ESD Protection with ESD/EMP Immunity Threshold of 15KeV. [http://www.compex.com.sg:809/Datasheets/WLE600V5-23_Dsv1.0.2-141013-I.pdf] *Supports Spatial Multiplexing, Cyclic-Delay Diversity (CDD), low-density parity :check (LDPC), Maximal Ratio Combining (MRC), Space Time Block Code (STBC) *Supported by either CompexWRT with QCA Atheros Reference Wireless Driver :or OpenWRT with ath10k Wireless Driver on WPJ344 ===Ordering Configuration=== 
Item Code 	 	Chipset 	Card Information
WLE600V5-23 8AA000 	QCA9882 	2x2 11ac 5GHz High Power miniPCIe Radio
WLE600V5-23 8AB000 	QCA9882 	2x2 11ac 5GHz High Power miniPCIe Radio
